data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30418, Version Hash: 63c35f5155312cb85fc924d827c74351362e0e28
data.actual_result: It displays the US-keyboard characters irregardless of active layout.
data.expected_result: The symbols for the keys according to the active layout should be displayed. \` is Ö on the German layout.
data.short_description: Shortcut keys are referred to as their US-layout equivalent regardless of active alyout
data.steps_to_repro: - go to Discord settings - Overlay or Keybinds - record keybinds with non-Alphanumeric symbols and it will display the default US-symbols for those keys
